          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Let's Begin! (Module 1)</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire - English and Working Life for Beginners - Let's Begin! (Module 1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger -
lassen Sie uns anfangen! (Modul 1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le saphir - l'anglais et vie active pour des 
débutants - commençons ! (module 1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sapphire - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para
novatos - deixe-nos começar! (módulo 1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Zaffiro - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti
- cominciamo! (modulo 1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σάπφειρος - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για 
τους αρχαρίους - αρχίστε! (Ενότητα 1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Zafiro - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - comencemos! (módulo 1)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">What does the English alphabet look like? How do you pronounce the numbers? These, amongst other things, are what you will learn in Module 1.</string>
            <string language="en">What does the English alphabet look like? How do you pronounce the numbers? These, amongst other things, åre what you will learn in Module 1.</string>
          </description>

          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie was sieht das englische Alphabet aus? 
Wie sprechen Sie die Zahlen aus? Diese, unter anderen 
Sachen, åre, was Sie in Modul 1 erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">À quoi l'alphabet anglais ressemble-t-il ? 
Comment prononcez-vous les nombres ? Ceux-ci, entre autres
choses, åre ce que vous apprendrez dans le module 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que o alfabeto inglês olha como? Como você
pronuncia os números? Estes, amongst outras coisas, åre o que 
você aprenderá no módulo 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">A che cosa l'alfabeto inglese assomiglia? 
Come pronunciate i numeri? Questi, fra altre cose, åre 
che cosa imparerete in modulo 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι το αγγλικό βλέμμα αλφάβητου συμπαθεί; Πώς 
προφέρετε τους αριθμούς; Αυτοί, μεταξύ άλλων, εre τι θα
μάθετε στην ενότητα 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué el alfabeto inglés parece? ¿Cómo 
usted pronuncia los números? Éstos, entre otras cosas, åre 
qué usted aprenderá en el módulo 1.</string>
          </description>
